text: Ana zupage, Ruotge Avamumo azeri muse Jisasina higeno, anage huno hu'ne. Nafanimoka monane mopamofo Ramoka susu huna muse hugantoe. Na'ankure kagra ama zana antahi'zane vahe'mofontera erifra nekinka, osi mofavre nagakna hu'naza nagate eri ama nehane. Izo, Nafanimoka ama'i kagrima kavesiaza hu'nane.
